description: Pick one continuous section from the input, drop the rest.
name: trim

options.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be passed (default INT64_MAX)
options.name: start

options.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be dropped again (default INT64_MAX)
options.name: end

options.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be  passed (from I64_MIN to I64_MAX) (default I64_MIN)
options.name: start_pts

options.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be dropped again (from I64_MIN to I64_MAX) (default I64_MIN)
options.name: end_pts

options.description: Number of the first frame that should be passed to the output (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)
options.name: start_frame

options.description: Number of the first frame that should be dropped again (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default I64_MAX)
options.name: end_frame
